refnamediv.refpurpose: Flush data from a serial port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Flush to the screen any bytes (up to 32k) in the input buffer. Note that these bytes will be cleared from the buffer. use this opcode mainly for debugging messages. If you want to mix debugging and other communication messages over the same port, you will need to manually parse the data with the serialRead opcode.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: iPort -- port number optained from a serialBegin opcode.
